info.description: A REST API for managing projects
info.title: Prodyo Backend API

post.description: Authenticate user and return session token
Create a new user account with email, password, and name

get.description: Get all bugs for a specific task

post.description: Create a new bug for a task

get.description: Get a specific bug by its ID
Get all improvements for a specific task

post.description: Create a new improvement for a task

get.description: Get a specific improvement by its ID
Get indicator with causes and actions for a specific iteration

post.description: Create a new indicator for an iteration
Create a new action for an indicator
Create a new cause for an indicator

get.description: Get all iterations for a specific project

post.description: Create a new iteration for a project

get.description: Get a specific iteration by its ID

delete.description: Delete an iteration by its ID

get.description: Get a paginated list of all projects with their members

post.description: Create a new project with members and productivity range

get.description: Get all projects where the specified user is a member
Get a specific project by its ID with all members

put.description: Update an existing project with new data

400.description: Invalid project ID or request body

delete.description: Delete a project by its ID

get.description: Get all tasks for a specific iteration

post.description: Create a new task for an iteration

get.description: Get a specific task by its ID

400.description: Invalid task ID or request body

delete.description: Delete a task by its ID

get.description: Get a paginated list of all users
Get all users who are members of the specified project
Get a specific user by its ID

400.description: Invalid user ID or request body

delete.description: Delete a user by its ID

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
